error_message: Header must be first record when mandatory.
SQL_expression: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN hc.segment_is_mandatory = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN rec.rid = m.min_rid AND rec.tol = 'header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END) = 1 AS ok FROM (SELECT CAST(split(RecordID,'-')[0] AS INT) AS rid, lower(Type_of_Line) AS tol FROM df_raw) rec CROSS JOIN header_constraints hc CROSS JOIN (SELECT MIN(CAST(split(RecordID,'-')[0] AS INT)) AS min_rid FROM df_raw) m

error_message: Header must occur exactly once when mandatory; otherwise zero or one.
SQL_expression: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN hc.segment_is_mandatory = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IN (0,1) END AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN header_constraints hc

error_message: Header record length must equal Segment_Maximum_Length when mandatory.
SQL_expression: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN hc.segment_is_mandatory = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(r.RawRecord) = hc.segment_max_length THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END) = 1 AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN header_constraints hc

error_message: Footer must be present at the last record when mandatory.
SQL_expression: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN fc.segment_is_mandatory = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN rec.rid = m.max_rid AND rec.tol = 'footer' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END) = 1 AS ok FROM (SELECT CAST(split(RecordID,'-')[0] AS INT) AS rid, lower(Type_of_Line) AS tol FROM df_raw) rec CROSS JOIN footer_constraints fc CROSS JOIN (SELECT MAX(CAST(split(RecordID,'-')[0] AS INT)) AS max_rid FROM df_raw) m

error_message: Footer must occur exactly once when mandatory; optional files allow zero or one.
SQL_expression: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN fc.segment_is_mandatory = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='footer' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='footer' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IN (0,1) END AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN footer_constraints fc

error_message: Footer record length must equal Segment_Maximum_Length when mandatory.
SQL_expression: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN fc.segment_is_mandatory = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='footer' THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(r.RawRecord) = fc.segment_max_length THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END) = 1 AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN footer_constraints fc

error_message: All mandatory header fields must be present and non-empty in sequence.
SQL_expression: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)=0 THEN TRUE ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' AND f.field_is_mandatory='true' AND LENGTH(TRIM(SUBSTRING(r.RawRecord, CAST(f.start_pos AS INT), CAST(f.field_max_length AS INT)))) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 END AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN header_fields f

error_message: Header fields with expected values must match one of the expected values.
SQL_expression: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)=0 THEN TRUE ELSE MAX(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE(f.field_expected_values,'') = '' THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN array_contains(transform(split(f.field_expected_values, ','), x -> lower(trim(x))), lower(trim(SUBSTRING(r.RawRecord, CAST(f.start_pos AS INT), CAST(f.field_max_length AS INT))))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 0 END) = 1 END AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN header_fields f WHERE f.field_index='0'

error_message: Each header field value length must equal Field_Maximum_Length.
SQL_expression: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)=0 THEN TRUE ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' AND LENGTH(SUBSTRING(r.RawRecord, CAST(f.start_pos AS INT), CAST(f.field_max_length AS INT))) <> CAST(f.field_max_length AS INT) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 END AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN header_fields f

error_message: Header field occurrence must match Field_Occurrence for fixed-length (expected 1 each).
SQL_expression: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN lower(r.Type_of_Line)='header' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = MAX(CAST(hc.segment_occurrence AS INT)) AS ok FROM df_raw r CROSS JOIN header_constraints hc
